itemInfo.itemDesc: Zereth Shoes with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Zereth Shoes

item.name: Iron Ingot
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards. It requires knowledge of Heating: Beginner.
※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Tough Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying rhino, pig, or cow hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Green Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Green Crystals found near Rhutum Outstation.

item.name: Zereth Shoes of Iron Wall
item.desc: Energy of iron wall is contained within this Zereth Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Zereth Shoes of Iron wall, Zereth Shoes

item.name: Grade 3 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 3rd-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Zereth Shoes
item.desc: High-quality armor which gives less fatigue to its wearer\n- Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: Zereth Shoe of Agility
item.desc: Energy of agility is contained within this Zereth Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Zereth Shoes of Agility, Zereth Shoes

item.name: Zereth Shoes of Intimidation
item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Zereth Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Zereth Shoes of Duress, Zereth Shoes

item.name: Zereth Shoes of Iron Wall
item.desc: Energy of iron wall is contained within this Zereth Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Zereth Shoes of Iron wall, Zereth Shoes
